message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's a fair deal for the first round.
Your split was a bit too much in your favor. How about we try something a little closer to the middle?
I understand you want something closer to the middle, so I've adjusted my offer.  Time is ticking, and the value is decreasing!
This is getting us nowhere. I need you to make a significant move towards the middle or this is going to be a waste of time.
Bob, I'm meeting you closer to the middle. Let's close this deal before the money shrinks further!
Alice, this is ridiculous.  It's a 50/50 split. Take it or leave it.  We're both losing out the longer this goes.
